`,(0,f.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,f.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`import { useCallback, useState } from "react";\r
\r
const useInput = (initialData) => {\r
  const [value, setValue] = useState(initialData);\r
\r
  const handler = useCallback((e) => {\r
    setValue(e.target.value);\r
  }, []);\r
  return [value, handler, setValue];\r
};\r
\r
export default useInput;
